stocksID.description: Primary key for the stock entry, auto-incremented

userID.description: Reference to the User collection (foreign key)

stockSymbol.description: Stock symbol (ticker), maximum length of 10 characters

sharesOwned.description: Number of shares owned, stored as a decimal

purchasePrice.description: Purchase price per share, stored as a decimal

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the stock entry was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the stock entry was last updated
